src_original: dharmasya dravyād artha-antara-bhūtatvāt.  01406 arthāntaratve api dharma-kāraṇatve dharma-antarasya  01407 kāryasya utpādanād dravyasya pariṇāma iti iṣṭaṃ syāt. tad aviruddham

hetu-phala-santāne mṛd-dravya-ākhye pūrvakān  01409 mṛt-piṇḍa-dravyāt kāraṇād uttarasya ghaṭa-dravyasya  01410 kāryasya utpattau mṛd-dravyaṃ pariṇatam iti vyavahārasya upagamāt.  01411 na ca dharmasya dravyāt tattvānyatvābhyām anyo  01412 vikalpaḥ sambhavati,
01413 na nirvivekaṃ dravyam eva dharmaḥ,  na api dravyād  01414 artha-antaram,
